PER CURIAM.
Judgments of Sentence Affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 744
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donti A. BRUNDAGE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Sept. 19, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
Gilbert J. Scutti, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
